data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The Phong reflection model doesn't take translucency into account, i.e. the ____ that ____ is ____ through a material. This ____ is ____ translucent ____, i.e. surfaces ____ allow ____ to ____ from ____ face ____ the ____, e.g. paper, clothes, plastic films, or leaves.

This tuto____ is ab___ translucent surf____, i.e. surfaces th__ allow li___ to tran____ from o__ face t_ the ot___, e.g. paper, clothes, plastic films, or leaves.
data.answer: Phong的反射模型没有考虑到半透明，也就是光通过材料传播的可能性。本教程是关于半透明的表面，即允许光线从一个面传输到另一个面，例如纸、衣服、塑料薄膜或树叶。
